activities: Birch Street (BirchStreet) is an enterprise procurement SaaS that transmits purchase orders from our business customers to their suppliers.  A purchase order may contain the name of the employee of the business, the job title of the employee, and the employer's address and contact information.  The information is contained in the purchase order as to why the information is transmitted.  The information is only transmitted when the employee, who must have the authority, chooses to transmit the information in order to submit the purchase order.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: First Name, Last Name, Job Title, Employer, Employer's Contact Information
privacyprograms: Birch Street has a self regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: BirchStreet will be using the Better Business Bureau's Safe Harbor Service for our independent recourse mechanism.
